main.hero: From Brazil to the world, we play Brazilian music, teleporting to its origins.

history.title: History
history.text: The encounter took place on the sidewalk on a hot summer night, where musicians gradually gathered around a guitar, a tambourine, and some voices. The day was dawning, and in the gutter, we became six musicians improvising Brazilian music in Berlin, turning it into a sidewalk samba.

release.title: Press Kit
release.text: Samba de Sarjeta carries a profound significance for the people of Brazil, extending beyond a mere gathering of Samba musicians. It embodies a vibrant way of life that shapes the daily existence of countless Brazilians abroad. Musicians spanning generations, devoted Samba aficionados, and cherished friends unite in a laid-back ambiance, immersing themselves in the rhythmic Samba world from eve until the early morning, all while relishing Brazilian heritage music.  In Berlin, diverse collectives consistently infuse this slice of Brazilian culture into the city's soul, igniting a passionate fire reminiscent of Brazil's vibrant spirit.

footer.title: Links
footer.members_list: Eryka (Singer), Bernardo (Singer), Julien (Guitar), Guilherme (Guitar 2), Avelino (Cavaquinho), Ricardo (Percussion), Marcos (Percussion), Fernando (Percussion), David (Sax), Suzi (Flute 1) ), Manoela (flute 2) Shiche (Trombone).
